extension.summary: Sendspin client and audio proxy service
extension.description:
This service connects to a Sendspin audio server and proxies the audio into Kodi's native player.
It works by creating a local HTTP server that streams the audio in WAV format, and then directs the Kodi player to this local URL.
The addon is in an alpha state and was developed with AI assistance.
extension.disclaimer: This is experimental software and is provided "as is", without warranty of any kind. Use at your own risk.
